review: Very good behaviour. Good treatment and advised properly. Tech care Is best Dental solution in Chinar park.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: At an early age I had lost some of my tooth. I was worried about my lifestyle. The dentist asked me to get the implants that will not affect my lifestyle. I am quite satisfied with the suggestions and advice I git here. I will get the implants in my next visit.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have misaligned teeth for which I visited Dr. Sanket and he advised me of the dental braces. I will get the dental braces to reshape my smile. The consultation went well with the dentist and he took proper time to explain me the the treatment possibilities.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My teeth are misaligned and recently I have started feeling the problem of bad breath. I consulted the dentist who gave me the proper advice and instructions to get rid of the bad breath. For misalignment, I need the dental braces treatment for which I will surely visit quite soon.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had pain in my tooth for last few days which made me visit this dentist. The dentist after proper examination told of the deep cavity I had. He asked me for RCT and capping to save my tooth. I will get the procedure followed because I do not want to loose my teeth at this early age.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Because of the pain in the upper back tooth region, I was very uncomfortable and could not eat the food properly. I visited the dentist who advised me of extraction and gave me some medicines which subsided the pain. Now I am able to consume my regular food without much pain. I will surely get the extraction done at the earliest.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am taking medicines for diabetes which I informed the dentist about. He was very patient in listening to what I had to say. He advised of dental implant and did a scaling of my teeth to make my oral hygiene better. He also gave me a mouth wash to keep my mouth fresh. I am happy with the consultation.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I just visited the dentist for the dental implant of two missing teeth. But once the dentist took the digital impression or x-ray whatever it is called, he advised me some other procedures as well. I trust this dentist because he has been the one to serve my family and friends so I took the treatment and yes, now the treatment is complete and I am back to normalcy.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had lost some of the teeth at an early age so I decided to get the dental implants. In this context I had visited this dentist and he also asked me for the same. I had got the dental implants done and the results are phenomenal. I am so happy to get comfortable artificial tooth for a healthier oral health.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: The front teeth of mine were bit unshaped and thus my smile looked very bad. I visited the dentist and asked for the treatment. I was advised to get the entire smile designing. I was very excited to have a complete new smile to make it more attractive and brighter. Just has a great experience at this clinic.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had lost some teeth due to my habit of eating tobacco. I felt badbecause of the hole created. I visited the dentist and asked to replace it. The dentist immediately prescribed my dental implants and I got it done from him very happy with the implanted tooth.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had been here for the cavities and the dentist suggested me of RCT and dental crown. I have been suffering from the toothache from several months and finally visited this place for for the dental treatment. I had got RCT and dental crown from this dentist and now I am comfortable with eating both hot and cold and I have no pain now.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was having serious problem in eating food, it caused a lot of pain in my side teeth. I visited the dentist and he advised me of tooth extraction, I agreed to it and now I have got rid of pain. The treatment was effortless and I felt no pain during the process.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** **** ******* *** ********* ****** ****** ********** I was suffering from crooked teeth, thus I planned a dental visit and Dr Chakraverty suggested me an invisible dental braces treatment and I opted for it immediately. I am happy with the service.

context: Dental Implant Fixing,Immediate Dentures,Dental Cavity Filling,Artificial Teeth,
review: I was suffering from the problem of plague. I visited TeethCare and consulted Dr Sanket. I am convinced that I need dental implat procedure and I have got my immediate dental implant treatment from him. It works perfectly fine and I am having no pain and plague.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: *** ****** ** ***** I just had the issue with the wait time. Everytime I had visited the doctor, they are too late with no clear information about the schedule. Moreover, when I called the doctor to ask if the doctor is on time then I experienced a very rude behaviour on their side. The overall experience may have been nice if I would have been able to trust the doctor now as I don't know why so much rudeness is needed to treat a patient.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am having teeth alignment issues and have got treatment from this dentist. I was having crooked teeth and have got dental braces from here and I am hoping for the best results.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: The doctor was very patient and was very co operative when I told her to defer the treatment for a few  days. Unlike other  doctors who look for personal gains only,   she didn't even charge for this consultation since no procedure was done that day.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I wanted tooth extraction and RCT for my teeth. I told it to the dentist and he analyzed my teeth and said it can be done. The process was smooth and the entire staff is very polite. I am very satisfied with my dental visit

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had lost teeth at an early age. I was worried about my appearance. The dentist asked me to for dental implants. I had got it done and my appearance look better than before.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had pain and discomfort in my upper and lower teeth. I visited Dr. Sanket Chakraverty for the cure. He asked me for RCT and I got it done from this place. I am happy with the procedure and he did his best to give me as less pain as possible.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I was recommended for RCT because of the existing tooth having puss. As per the consultation I will surely get the RCT done but now I am taking the prescribed medicines that has relieved the pain a lot.
